hero.title: Building
hero.subtitle: A next-gen platform enabling citizens and administration to collaborate seamlessly for accountable, efficient governance.

problems.title: Solving
problems.subtitle: Addressing the challenges in modern civic governance with technology.

lackTransparency.title: Lack of Transparency
lackTransparency.description: Citizens have no visibility into projects, funds, or contractor performance.

slowGrievance.title: Slow Grievance Handling
slowGrievance.description: Reporting and resolving local issues is slow, inefficient, and lacks tracking.

poorAccountability.title: Poor Accountability
poorAccountability.description: Contractors lack performance tracking and quality assurance is often minimal.

dataSilos.title: Data Silos
dataSilos.description: Administrators struggle with manual data instead of real-time analytics.

features.title: Powerful
features.subtitle: Everything you need for transparent, efficient, and accountable civic engagement.

liveTracking.title: Live Project Tracking
liveTracking.description: Track all development works with budget transparency, contractor details, and geo-locations on an interactive map.

smartComplaints.title: Smart Geo-Tagged Complaints
smartComplaints.description: Report issues instantly with GPS location, photos, and real-time resolution tracking. Get instant zone routing.

contractorRating.title: Contractor Rating System
contractorRating.description: Rate completed projects and hold contractors accountable. Automatic flagging for poor performers.

adminDashboard.title: Admin Dashboard & Analytics
adminDashboard.description: Real-time insights into active projects, pending complaints, resolution times, and flagged contractors.

transparentGovernance.title: Transparent Governance
transparentGovernance.description: Full budget breakdowns, contractor identities, and project statuses visible to all citizens.

realTimeUpdates.title: Real-Time Updates
realTimeUpdates.description: Get instant notifications on complaint status, project progress, and resolution updates.

aiVerification.title: AI-Powered Verification
aiVerification.description: Automatic categorization of issues using advanced image recognition.

citizenRewards.title: Citizen Rewards
citizenRewards.description: Earn civic points for reporting and verifying community issues.

testimonial1.name: Rajesh Kumar
testimonial1.content: Nagar Sewak has transformed how we report issues. My complaint about a pothole was resolved in just 3 days!

testimonial2.name: Priya Sharma
testimonial2.content: The transparency in project budgets and contractor ratings gives us confidence in our local governance.

testimonial3.name: Amit Patel
testimonial3.content: The dashboard helps us track everything in real-time. It's a game-changer for municipal management.

cta.title: Start Making a Difference Today
cta.subtitle: Join NagarSewak and contribute to building a more transparent and responsive local government.

spotlight.title: Transforming
spotlight.subtitle: Experience transparent, efficient, and accountable municipal management through next-gen technology.

transparency.title: Total Transparency
transparency.description: Every complaint logged is tracked on an immutable public ledger. Citizens can verify the status of road repairs, sanitation drives, and budget allocation in real-time.

geo.title: Geo-Tagged Precision
geo.description: Pinpoint issues with customized GIS markers. Upload photos and videos that are automatically geo-stamped to prevent duplicate reports and ensure crews reach the exact spot.

contracts.title: Merit-Based Contracts
contracts.description: Contractors are rated by citizens upon job completion. High-performing agencies get priority, while poor performers are flagged automatically by the smart system.

hero.title: Your Voice, Your City
hero.subtitle: Empowering citizens to report issues and track municipal projects in real-time

report.title: Report Issues
report.description: Submit geo-tagged complaints with photo evidence

report.title: Report an Issue
report.subtitle: Submit a geo-tagged report to your local administration

filed.title: Report Filed
filed.desc: Instant ID generation & AI-based categorization routed to the correct department.

onsite.title: Officer On-Site
onsite.desc: Field officer dispatched to the geotagged location for verification.

resolution.title: Resolution
resolution.desc: Issue resolved with photo evidence & updated status on your dashboard.

slogan.title:
Your Voice,
Our Action.
slogan.desc: Together, we build a cleaner, safer, and smarter city. Report issues directly to the administration and track real-time progress.

form.subHeader: Fill in the details below to file an official complaint.
form.subject: Subject
form.descriptionPlaceholder: Provide detailed information about the issue...

map.title: Interactive Map
map.adjustFilters: Try adjusting your search or status filters.

citizen.title: Citizen Dashboard
citizen.subtitle: Your contributions help build a better city. Track your reports and see the impact.
citizen.submitFirst: Submit your first complaint to get started

reportsPage.title: Official Reports
reportsPage.subtitle: Repository of your submitted grievances
reportsPage.noResultsDesc: Your search filters returned no results.
reportsPage.noReportsDesc: You have not submitted any reports yet.

historyPage.title: Activity Log
historyPage.subtitle: Timeline of your interactions and submissions

profilePage.title: Citizen Profile
profilePage.subtitle: Manage your personal details and preferences

analyticsPage.title: Analytics & Insights
analyticsPage.subtitle: Visualizing your contribution to a better city
analyticsPage.resolutionRateDesc: The percentage of your submitted complaints that have been successfully marked as 'Resolved' by the authorities.
analyticsPage.civicScoreDesc: A gamified score reflecting your engagement. Earn points for every report filed and verified resolution.
analyticsPage.highPriorityDesc: Issues marked with Severity 4 or 5. These are tracked for immediate attention due to their critical nature.

privacy.title: Privacy & Data Control
privacy.subtitle: Manage your personal data and privacy settings

export.title: Export Your Data
export.description: Download a complete copy of your personal data in JSON format. This includes all information we have about you.

retention.title: Data Retention Policy
retention.description: We retain your data according to our privacy policy and legal requirements:

deletion.title: Delete Your Account
deletion.description: Permanently delete your account and personal data. This action cannot be undone.

confirm.title: Confirm Account Deletion
confirm.message: Are you sure you want to delete your account? This action cannot be undone.

admin.title: Admin Dashboard
admin.subtitle: Municipal Corporation of India
admin.noCriticalAlerts: No critical alerts at this moment.

contractorsPage.title: Contractor Management
contractorsPage.subtitle: Verified Contractor Registry
contractorsPage.noFlaggedDesc: All registered contractors are operating within normal compliance parameters.

complaintsPage.title: Complaint Management
complaintsPage.subtitle: Resolve Citizen Grievances
complaintsPage.noComplaintsDesc: Great job! All issues are resolved.

empty.title: No projects assigned
empty.desc: Projects assigned to you by administrators will appear here automatically.

empty.title: No open opportunities found
empty.desc: Check back later for new tenders.
